definition: a conclusion to be made based on presented facts or information : a main point or key message to be learned or understood from something experienced or observed
examples: The takeaway is clear: cats are a growing environmental concern because they are driving down some native bird populations …
One of the main takeaways stressed by the panelists was that social media is about conversation, not just dissemination.

definition: the first movement of the backswing in golf
an act or instance of taking possession of the ball or puck from an opposing team
